titleStmt.title: SII 14.80: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 80. (A.R. No. 421 of 1914.) PAḶḶIMAḌAM, ARUPPUKKOTTAI TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH BASE OF THE KĀLANĀTHASVĀMIN TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription is dated in the 4th year opposite to the 4th year of the same king's reign. It registers a gift of sheep by Aruḷāḻi, the headman of a village in Veṇbu-nāḍu, for burning a lamp in the temple of god Sundara-Pāṇḍya-Īśvarattu-Dēvar at Tiruchchuḻiyal, for the merit of his son Kaṇḍaṉ-Dēvaṉ.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . coḻaṉṟalaikoṇṭa kovirapāṇṭiyaṟku yāṇṭu 4 Itaṉetir 4 Ivvāṇṭu paruttikkuṭināṭṭu tevatāṉam tiruccuḻiyal paḷḷipaṭaiyc cuntarapāṇṭi Īśvara
ttu tevarkku veṇpuṉāṭṭu kuṭi kiḻavaṉaruḷāḻi taṉ makaṉ kaṇṭaṉ tevaṉai cārtti vaicca tiruviḷakku Oṉṟu . Ivviḷakkukku vaicca Āṭu cāvā muvāp pe
rāṭu Irupattaiñcum Aṭaikoṇṭa Iṭaiyaṉ paruttikkuṭi nāṭṭup peruñcennilakuṭi kuḻuvāṇai pūti Irupattaiñcu [6 .*] Ivaiñciṉāl ney coḻiyanāḻiyāl
ney Āḻākkum Aṭṭuvitāka Iṟaippuṇai paṭṭeṉ tiruccuḻiyal tevar veṭṭikkuṭi Iṭaiyaṉ Aḻimuṉai caṭai kuṭi maṇiyaṉ .On the same south wall, the following incomplete and fragmentary pieces are seen— A 1 tevatāṉam tiruccuḻiyal paḷḷipaṭai cuntarapāṇṭiya īśvaraka— 2 i tirumukamvara innāṭṭu nāṭṭomu muṭaṉiruntu ellaikāṭṭa i— 3 ṉum atikārañ ceykiṉṟa poḻiyūr cuṟṟuppoḻiyū— 4 yākavum kaṇaiyappaḷḷit teṉṉavaṉuttira mantiri— B 1 tiruccuḻiyal paḷḷipaṭai sun=tarapāṇḍya īśvarattu āḻvārkku itte- 2 uḻakkāl nicatam āḻākku neykku vacca cāva muvāp perāṭu irupattai[ñ*]cum co- 3 ••• taṉukkup puṇai ittevar veṭṭikkuṭi potiyi ṉāyaṉ |||-
Digital edition of SII 14.80 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
